summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4557 for the improvement of Mercer Street from 9th Avenue North to Warren Avenue, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53296, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
